app.name: ZIS Tutorial - Slack Notifier Part 2
app.short_description: An example app to show case Zendesk apps being used as an admin UI for Zendesk Integration Services
app.long_description: An example app to show case Zendesk apps being used as an admin UI for Zendesk Integration Services
app.installation_instructions: Follow the instruction to install as a private app: https://developer.zendesk.com/documentation/apps/getting-started/uploading-and-installing-a-private-app/
